info.title: Read grouping information of a grouped, partially checked checkbox in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first checkbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('[role="checkbox"]').focus();

user: When reading cursor is on the first checkbox, read its grouping information.
instructions.raw: When reading cursor is on the first checkbox, read its grouping information.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
